name: Robot Ranchers
description:
Game made in 72 hours for GMCJamXXX (Game Maker Community Jam).

Find and save your fellow robots from the dangerous pirates and they'll join your crew. Each robot is a playable character with unique abilities. After combat you can harvest your crops in your ship, while you go to the next island.

Credits: Pere (programming & art), Aaron Ishibashi (music & sounds), Fausto (art).
